name: Lustrous Spirit
description:
Lustrous Spirit is a game based off of Land of the Lustrous/Houseki no Kuni, where you can explore the world of the series and see where events took place.

All credit for memory animations and soundtrack goes to the creators and licensers of the anime. This is a fan work, and will never be profited from.

To play, download the game folder, unzip, and then run 'HousekiUE5.exe'. This is a windows-only build.

Controls: WASD movement, spacebar to jump, Q for menu, E for zoom, shift for sprint, B for close-focus.

Please give feedback! Form: https://forms.gle/u5viVGPUEamuSeav5
